headline: AM Best Places Credit Ratings of Granular Insurance Company Under Review With Positive Implications
summary: OLDWICK, N.J., July 09, 2025--AM Best has placed under review with positive implications the Financial Strength Rating of A- (Excellent) and the Long-Term Issuer Credit Rating of "a-" (Excellent) of Granular Insurance Company (Granular) (Charleston, SC).

headline: Elevance Health, Inc. (ELV) Investors Who Lost Money Have Opportunity to Lead Securities Fraud Lawsuit
summary: BENSALEM, Pa., July 9, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- The Law Offices of Howard G. Smith announces that investors with substantial losses have opportunity to lead the securities fraud class action lawsuit...
